features: 【Material】Temedara fuzzy shaggy rugs are made of high quality Microfiber fabric, velvet surface.A plush, thick pile shag rug is the perfect landing spot for your feet. High pile is what gives these rugs their shaggy look.
【Perfect in Any Room】Shags are cozy bedroom favorite and great for bathrooms too. A shag rug makes for a nice addition in the nursery, playroom，bedroomn，living room and family room.

【Modern Design】Fluffy rug offer a diverse range of designs so you're rug is always in style. Shags will complement a wide range of decorating styles so you will love it now and later as your style evolves.

【Low Maintenance】If cleaned regularly, shags will remain fluffy. Drape the shaggy rug outside and gently beat so all of the dust is loosened. Leave it outside for a few hours so the sun can make the plush rug more fluffy.

【Area Rug Notice】The faux fur rug color may look slightly different under different lighting conditions, we apologize for the inconvenience it will cause you, and we will give you a satisfactory solution in time.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Temedara Super Soft Fluffy Plush Shaggy Cozy Area Rugs for Living Room and Bedroom

Super Soft Modern Shag Rug A plush, thick pile shag rug is the perfect landing spot for your feet, they are also a great room decoration, for example in living rooms and bedrooms. Non-Slip Area Rug for Room Temedara fluffy rugs backing with non-slip rubber dots,that can keep the rugs stably in place and give children a soft and comfortable playing space. Easy to Clean Shake off the dirt;Wipe with damp cloth and air dry.Vacuun cleaner to remove dust and dirt.

Tips From Temedara 1.Packaging In order to prevent dust better, we use vacuum packing and the rug will appear thin after opening the package, it will take 1-2 days to recover the thickness, please do not worry about this situation. 2.Clearance Instructions: Shaking it off to get extra debris out. Then use a low-power vacuum cleaner.You could add some mild detergent and gently wash the carpet by hand, then put the rug in the ventilation to dry or air dry.Not machine washable. 3.Colour difference Due to the different lighting effects of the monitor and camera, the image may be slightly different from the actual color of the product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Temedara Navy Blue Rug for Living Room Bedroom, 4x6 Feet
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Temedara Navy Blue Rug, and it has exceeded my expectations in terms of softness and fitting the designated space. Here's my review based on my experience:Pros:Soft and Plush Texture:One of the standout features of this rug is its soft and plush texture. It feels luxurious underfoot, adding a cozy and comfortable element to the living room or bedroom.Perfect Fit for the Space:The 4x6 feet dimensions of the rug were a perfect fit for my designated space. It covers the area wonderfully, providing a visually appealing and cohesive look to the room.Navy Blue Color:The navy blue color is rich and vibrant, adding a touch of sophistication to the room. It complements various decor styles and is versatile enough to blend with different color schemes.Anti-Skid Feature:The anti-skid feature is practical, especially in high-traffic areas. It ensures that the rug stays securely in place, preventing slips and enhancing safety.Easy to Maintain:The rug is easy to maintain. Regular vacuuming helps keep it clean, and any spills or stains are easily addressed. This makes it a practical choice for everyday use.Versatility in Use:The rug's versatile size and design make it suitable for various rooms, including living rooms and bedrooms. It adds a touch of warmth and style to different spaces within the home.Overall Impression:I absolutely love the Temedara Navy Blue Rug. Its softness, perfect fit for the space, and the rich navy blue color have enhanced the overall ambiance of my living room or bedroom. The anti-skid feature adds a practical element, and it's been a delightful addition to my home decor.If you're looking for a high-quality, soft, and visually appealing rug that fits well in various spaces, I highly recommend the Temedara Navy Blue Rug. It combines comfort and style seamlessly, making it a wonderful investment for any home.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super soft but no slip resistant feature
reviews.reviewText: My son wanted this rug. I must say it is very nice . He received it with his Christmas and today it still looks new. The only thing I would recommend is to purchase a roll of rug tape. It doesn’t have any slip resistant features on it and slid very easily on the tile until we used the tape. Overall and excellent rug!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought two of the rainbow rugs for my dog's room. I have two fur babies and like to have rugs in their room for them to jump down onto when they are getting out of their beds onto slippery wooden floors.My observations:. They are not non slip. I've had to place them under the feet of both beds so they won't slide across the room when the girls jump down on them.. They don't take cleaning very well. I tried cleaning one of them where there was some mud on it and it smeared and never "recovered" from the cleaning. I used a name brand carpet cleaner on a soft cloth but the rug stayed flat in the spot I cleaned and felt funny. I made sure none of the product was left in the rug, but wound up cutting off about 12 inches on one end so I wouldn't have to see it or feel it.. The colors are pretty but not as pronounced as in the pictures.. The rug does have good floof to it but it cannot be vacuumed as in the pictures. It has to be taken outside and beaten or shook. Even on the easiest setting on any of my 3 vacuum cleaners, they eat it!. For the price it's a decent deal, but this will not be a long term relationship.I would recommend this for a very low traffic area as the floof is very soft and has good loft, but I don't see it lasting any length of time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This rug fits perfect in my daughter room next to her bed. It’s super soft! You will need a grip mat or grip tape to hold the rug in place as it easily slides. This rug might also be hard to vacuum but it’s small enough to shake out. Perfect little addition to her room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Rug is lighter than I thought it would be. Can't use vacuum or it sucks it up. Overall it's soft and looks good

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what I was looking for
reviews.reviewText: I love this rug! I have hardwood floors in my bedroom and I needed a rug for warmth. It’s soft and so warm. I love the white and have gotten several compliments on it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars SMELLS LIKE DEATH. You WILL regret this purchase!
reviews.reviewText: 8x10 rug was a wonderful addition to my living room but chemical smell is so intense that it burns your nose and eyes. Would have given a star or two more if they didn’t blatantly lie on their page with the “no odor” proclamation. Gee I wonder what made them need to say that? I Periodically douse with febreeze and baking soda but to no avail. The living room has become a graveyard of distant memories, to a better, simpler time, a time when my family didn’t need a gas mask to watch Netflix. I now have to purchase a rug that doesn’t smell like paint thinner and baby vomit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft cute pink rug!!
reviews.reviewText: I personally think the color matches the rug in the photo. When the rug came I thought it was gonnna be too thin and not big enough, i got the 5x7 rug, and it’s more than enough for my room! It’s super soft material and i love it for my room’s aesthetic. You just kinda have to flatten it out when you first get it because of how it was packaged but other than than it’s super nice for the price!
